Articles.Content:
I call it the Revised Ataraxia and it has superb vtol capabilities. I had no experience with vtols with my old ataraxia, but not after [thread=94072]Esoter[/thread]. Now I will rule the world in the ultimate acrobatic vtol fighter jet that I have built myself . It deserves the highest of the highest color rating which is obviously lime green (which basically makes it the kind of like the su-27 in on Earth, but this is Kerbin (sparta?). It is really easy to control, and that one single engine is strong enough for forward flight . Anyways I made a video about, in which I had my best edit of a video ever (it went so smooth and so easy)

Download

Please check out my other designs if you like this one. I have a bunch of SSTO's, Acrobatics jets/replicas, cars, and vtols!

Edited October 5, 2014 by manni01

NICE! I like your style:cool:

Needs weapons is all. "MODs"

NICE! I like your style:cool:

Needs weapons is all. "MODs"

Or stock weapons.
Very sleek design. Will definetely try it once I get the chance!

Lol at that ugly SAS unit spam sticking out of the frame! I think you put a cable there but the game didn't save it properly or something.

After removing all the reaction wheels it is still very agile and responsive

also the wing doesnt loose it's stability much when you spin it around at low speed and high trust wich is great (except when you try moving backward then it gets a bit weird)

Gz very nice VTOL

Thanks for the good feedback guys.

Also, I will make a video about missiles different versions of them

BTW this thread was my 100th post!

Lol at that ugly SAS unit spam sticking out of the frame! I think you put a cable there but the game didn't save it properly or something.

After removing all the reaction wheels it is still very agile and responsive

also the wing doesnt loose it's stability much when you spin it around at low speed and high trust wich is great (except when you try moving backward then it gets a bit weird)

Gz very nice VTOL

yeah I had a strut leading from the sas to the wings and it might not have loaded

I don't even know why pitching down makes to flip out, but i guess that makes it more realistic

fighter jets dont pitch down because of negative g's
[update] I fixed the download craft, so now the sas units shouldn't wiggle through the hull
